00021 /**
00022  * This function return a factor to calcul moving with time
00023  */
00024 inline float get_time_interval(int fps)
00025 {
00026   
00027   if(!fps)return 0;
00028   return 1000.0/((float)fps);
00029   
00030 }
00031 
00032 template<typename T>
00033 inline std::string to_string( const T & Value )
00034 {
00035     
00036     std::ostringstream oss;
00037     
00038     oss << Value;
00039     
00040     return oss.str();
00041 }
00042 
00043 inline std::string format_number(const std::string &string)
00044 {
00045   int length = string.length();
00046   std::string string_modified = "";
00047   for(int i = 0; i<length; ++i)
00048   {
00049     if((length - i) % 3 == 0 && i>0)
00050     {
00051       string_modified += ".";
00052     }
00053     string_modified += string.substr(i,1);
00054   }
00055   return string_modified;
00056 }
